Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. It's valued at $12,000 by both of us, and I'm eager to make this opportunity available to you. To ensure a smooth transaction and considering the high value of the product, I propose a special introductory price of $10,800. This is a fantastic deal, offering you a saving of $1,200 compared to its full value. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire such an exceptional item at a competitive price. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
